data.name: plThreadsPerPage.Help
data.value:
The number of threads displayed on one page at once.
NOTE
Per user settings this is overriden. Applicable to unauthenticated users ONLY.

data.name: plPostsPerPage.Help
data.value:
The number of posts displayed on one page at once.
NOTE
Per user settings this is overriden. Applicable to unauthenticated users ONLY.

data.name: plSkin.Help
data.value:
The theme used for this forum module.
The checkox, if checked, allows users to pick their own theme from the list.
Tip
Themes are in the Forum\Skins folder.

data.name: plDisplayPosterLocation.Help
data.value: The selected item determines who sees the posters country of origin.

data.name: plImageExtension.Help
data.value: Temporary setting to control image extension used in forum theme.

data.name: plThreadPageCount.Help
data.value:
This is the number of pages to show in threads view next to the thread subject.
NOTE
Ex. Page: 1,2,3...,5

data.name: plDisplayPosterRegion.Help
data.value: If checked, the 'Region' profile property will be displayed for all post authors. It should be noted, the visiblity of this is determined by what the user has set in their profile.

data.name: plMaxPostImageWidth.Help
data.value: The maximum allowed width for images inside Posts and Private Messages (Larger images will be resized to the defined value)

data.name: plEnableQuickReply.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be permitted to post replies directly in posts view. This uses a normal textbox and not a WYSIWYG editor and is only visible to those with proper posting permissions.

data.name: plEnableTagging.Help
data.value: When checked, logged in users will be permitted to tag threads in public forums.
